main.name: Art Beatte IV
main.description: I build cool shit at scale!
main.bio: I am born and raised in North Seattle. Building things is my passion. I am incapable of stopping. I currently work at Facebook. When I am not there I create wood artwork, lift weights, invest in financial markets and generally try to learn something new every day.

resume.skillmessage: I engineer interesting things, using cutting edge technology, at scale.

education.degree: Graduate Certificate in Software Design & Development
education.description: Data structures; SDLC, Software modeling, Systems programming, Testing and QA.
OOP; Modularity; Python; Java; JUnit Testing; GUI.

education.degree: B.A. in Sociology with Minor in Psychology
education.description: Statistics; Demography; Personality; Deviance; Criminal Justice; Social Grouping.

work.title: Senior Software Engineer
work.description: I began my work on Facebook Login for Android, web, SDK, etc. (lived through Cambridge Analytica). From there I ran the Business Login team from inception through to launch. I have worked on Marketplace Growth as well as Rooms for Web.

work.title: Sorfware Engineer
work.description: Joined on as part of the Android mobile team. Eventually lead the Android and Mobile teams. Moved on to a Web Admin Console team and began work on APIs.

projects.title: SmartScale
projects.category: Fitness and Weight Tracking Android app
